thread.title: Jamie Bliss
thread.title_full: US Service Animals reviewed by Jamie Bliss

author: Jamie Bliss
title: Jamie Bliss
text: Omg the people here not only helped my husband an I but saved our dogs life...long story short landlord gave us a 3 day get rid of or evic notice because our sweet loving PITTY he is now safe an will go to any home we may move to thank u guys u saved a very happy family my husband has needed a medical ESA n they are the reason he is happy an confident now!
